title: Income Tax Department Updates Utilities and JSON Schemas for AY 2025–26
content:
# Income Tax Department Updates Utilities and JSON Schemas for AY 2025–26

Ek important update hai. Income Tax Department ne Assessment Year (AY) 2025-26 ke liye revised return filing utilities aur JSON schemas announce kiye hain. Yeh updates December 23 aur 24, 2025 ke beech release kiye gaye hain.

*   **Kya Update Hua Hai:**
    *   **Common Offline Utility (ITR-1 se ITR-4 tak):** Iski latest version 1.2.7 Windows aur Mac users ke liye jaari ki gayi hai.
    *   **Separate Utilities aur JSON Schemas:** ITR-3, ITR-5, aur ITR-6 ke liye alag se Excel-based tools, utilities, JSON schemas, schema change documents, aur validation manuals bhi update kiye gaye hain.
    *   **Form 3CEB:** International aur specified domestic transactions (Section 92E) ke liye Form 3CEB ki utility aur schema bhi update ho gayi hai.
    *   **Form 10B:** Charitable aur religious trusts ke liye Form 10B ki utility aur schema bhi December 23, 2025 tak update ki gayi hai.

*   **Kyun Zaruri Hai Yeh Update:** In updates ka main objective taxpayers ke liye smooth aur accurate compliance provide karna hai. Inme latest structural changes, validations, aur system enhancements shamil kiye gaye hain. Isse filing ke dauran errors kam honge aur return submission seamless banega. Taxpayers aur tax professionals ko salah di jaati hai ki woh AY 2025-26 ke returns file karte samay sirf latest versions ka hi use karein.

## Read the Official Document
* [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.incometax.gov.in/iec/foportal/downloads/income-tax-returns)

*Published on: 27 December 2025*
